string.value: I should go see Moppie, who seemed tired and weary of waiting for his master.

I saw Moppie in Orbis, and he seemed unresponsive to my commands. You could tell he's been waiting for his master for a long time judging from the wrinkly, dirty, unruly hair he features. I wanted to help him out, but I cannot understand whatever Moppie is uttering. I need someone as a translator so I can talk to him, but ... should I ask for a person, or a fairy?
I had no idea what Moppie was saying, so I got to ask Lisa for some help.
Bark~bark bark bark~ bark bark bark!! Keeeeng ~~ \r\n#b#L0#Bark~bark bark bark~ bark bark bark!! Keeeeng ~~~#l\r\n#L1# What? I want to help you#l#k
Moppie started wagging its tails and smiled as if it understood what I was saying, but I have no clue as to what HE's saying.
On my way here, I think I ran into a lady that may know something about this ... I should ask her some questions about Moppie.

Is Moppie really hurt? I can sort of connect with him. I can feel some kind of a vibe from him, but ... there's no way I can tell exactly what he's trying to say. I can tell he's in pain, though ... poor thing ...
There is one way to translate Moppie's barkings into actual words ... if you really want to help him out ... then come see me again. I'll tell you how to do it.
